articleTitleTranslated: Vaccine Hope drives record equity inflow
articleContent: In den vergangenen Wochen flossen laut Bank of America 115 Mrd. Dollar in Aktienfonds.
articleContentTranslated: In the past few weeks, $ 115 billion has flowed into equity funds, according to Bank of America.
